CustomField.description: Base delay in minutes for worker retry exponential backoff. Actual delay = min(base * 2^retryCount, 10).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Base wait time (in minutes) before retrying a failed worker. Delay doubles with each retry up to a maximum of 10 minutes. Warning: Higher values slow down the worker from continuing to process; 0-1 is recommended.
CustomField.label: Worker Retry Delay (min)
